Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery grooved vessel, the interior is covered with a brown-yellow resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and very faint traces of a red-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394285) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394285)
